item.title: How to install node.js, the easy way
item.description: We are going to look at how to install node.js the easy way on Mac OS X, Windows and Linux. You don't need to download the node package and try to install it. No! We are going to do it the easy way using package managers. Once you have node installed you will be able to run server-side JavaScript on your computer. We will also look at how you can upgrade node so you always have the latest version.
